channel.title: Client background
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is an extremely basic and simple client background. I know there isn't anything really special about this, but I was wondering if you guys would think this would look nice on a server. Does the text need different coloring? The background need to be changed? Or does it look fine?
I want your opinion so here it is.
[img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/w1b5ub.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client background

item.description:

khourys:

LINK

item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

Looks nice man. But you should make the text look better.
Change your lightroom and add some materials
No hate, Just trying to help !

item.title: Client background
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:543614”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=662495.msg4427968#msg4427968 date=1401744263]
Here is SansSerif

I don’t like how the “P” moves everything up and I would like to have that style “S” in the middle but it doesn’t quite work with the SansSerif. I’ll keep playing around with the text. Let me know if you guys think of another font to try out.

[/quote]
There’s millions of sans-serif fonts:
http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/list/classification/sans%20serif[/quote]

Oh man this helps a lot :D. I’ve been looking for basic fonts to use and I always hated going to dafont and finding individual ones slowly and one my one. Thanks man.

Read full topic

I don’t like how the “P” moves everything up and I would like to have that style “S” in the middle but it doesn’t quite work with the SansSerif. I’ll keep playing around with the text. Let me know if you guys think of another font to try out.[/quote]

I don’t like how the “P” moves everything up and I would like to have that style “S” in the middle but it doesn’t quite work with the SansSerif. I’ll keep playing around with the text. Let me know if you guys think of another font to try out.

item.title: Client background
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The text itself doesn’t match the theme. I’d use a sans-serif font and try and match the background more.
Otherwise I like it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:543614”]Nice, but the text should be changed
Glad to see you’re back too. Lol[/quote]

I wasn’t sure if you meant font or color. Here is a re-color that is easier on the eyes.

And I’m glad to be back :P. Finals just got over so I can stop worrying
